hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ESUS.ESUS_LOGIN_NAME, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN, ESUS.ESUS_ID, EOEU.EOEU_DEFAULT, EOEU.EOEU_ID, EOEU.CREATOR, EOEU.CREATE_TIME, EOEU.MODIFIER, EOEU.MODIFY_TIME, EOEU.REC_VER, EOEU.REC_STATUS, EOEU.ORG_ID, EOEU.EOEU_EOTO_CODE from EO_EORE_2_ESPU EOEU left join ES_USER ESUS on EOEU.ORG_ID = ESUS.ESUS_ESCO_ID and EOEU.EOEU_ESUS_ID=ESUS.ESUS_ID where 1=1 <<and EOEU.EOEU_EOTO_CODE LIKE :code>> <<and EOEU.ORG_ID =:orgId>>
